mapper.insert: insert into TBL_BOARD( cid, position, content, regDate) values ( #{cid}, #{position}, #{content}, DEFAULT )
mapper.select: select B.bno, B.cid, C.cname, B.position, B.content, B.regdate from TBL_BOARD B, TBL_COMPANY C where B.bno = #{bno} and B.cid = C.cid
mapper.update: update TBL_BOARD set position = #{position}, content = #{content}, updateDate = NOW() where bno=#{bno}
mapper.select: select B.bno, B.cid, C.cname, B.position, B.content, B.regdate from TBL_BOARD B, TBL_COMPANY C where B.cid = C.cid AND B.cid = #{cid}

select B.bno, B.cid, C.cname, B.position, B.content, B.regdate from TBL_BOARD B, TBL_COMPANY C where
(position like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR content like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) AND
B.cid = C.cid order by bno
